name: The Marble
description:
Draw bridges with your finger for the marble to move on. But be careful, every new bridge cancels the previous one! You can even make the marble jump and boost its speed - all of this in order to make it proceed with its journey. What is more, there is a leaderboard with the Top 10 high scores, which means you can compete with all of the other players around the world! Isn't this fun?

Features:
• excellent graphics
• smooth gameplay
• random obstacles
• calming sounds
• Global leaderboard using our server

Credits:
• Sound effects by freesfx.co.uk
